attributes.title: Horrible App (Using Black Magic)
attributes.review: I was recommended this app personally by my good friend Abraham Lincoln so of course I had high hopes for this app. Turns out it is horrible and I do NOT recommend downloading it. First off, it takes 53 days to download and when I finally got it, it deleted automatically. Of course I got mad because I wasted 2 months of my life trying to get this app. I was so mad I tried storming out of my room until a wall was formed in my door. I am currently under a double lock down because the door wonâ€™t break. I do NOT recommend this app unless you want an excuse to stay in your room.

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: I got this app to calm my nerves down. It ended up giving me a panic attack and when I showed the problem to my family they also got a panic attack. I canâ€™t believe how terrible this app was. There were a million ads that popped up and thatâ€™s what gave me such a bad panic attack. The screen in so annoying too that it hurt my head and gave me a head ache. Even my poor cat was hurt. The app smells and it is overall so ugly. I canâ€™t believe anyone would ever create something like this. I would never recommend this app to anyone. If I could give this a 0 I would 100% give it one. Disgrace to the App Store.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I literally hate this app. Like why was it made if itâ€™s not going to work. I do not understand the reason for this app to existing if itâ€™s not helpful to anyone. I do not think anyone should be downloading this app. I used it and I dose not work. Ugh. Like why even go out of you way to make a stupid app this glitches and signs you out. Please all of you whom are reading this understand this is not the app. Do waste your time waiting for it to load because it take literally like an hour at the most to load half of the page. I do not recommend using this app. Please take it down.

attributes.title: Trump killed my grandma
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app thinking that I could follow along with all of trumps wonderful life but then when I downloaded it told me to go back to my country ğŸ˜¿so then I started to cry but then the man himself showed up at my house and said he would kill my grandma if I didnâ€™t go with him to get deported but I like my house and me and my grandma arenâ€™t even that close so I just let him take her and kill her so that was traumatic and I got so SCARED and sometimes I just wanna be happy ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­ğŸ¤š but now the app took over my phone and all I ever hear is trumps voice saying for me to go eat some tacos and vote for himğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­ -Mikaela

attributes.title: just plain AWFUL
attributes.review: I got this app a few days ago hoping for the best and so far it has made my phone run so slow! It has been glitching as well and gives me so many virus and malware warnings constantly. Now none of this has EVER happened to me before downloading this app so I plan on getting rid of it shortly. Iâ€™ve never heard of an app that literally takes over your phone and I keep getting all these random pictures inserted into my camera roll!! VERY disappointing and I do NOT recommend this app to anyone who doesnâ€™t want to have to fight virus after virus being detected on your device.

attributes.title: awful, terrible, no good, very bad app
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! i downloaded it before and had to delete it due to inappropriate content of minors (which absolutely horrified me) i wrote a complaint thinking the problem would be fixed, was told that it was good to go and the content would be gone. HOWEVER, now i have a virus on my phone from redownloading it. my screen is always glitching and cheetos randomly pop up. the worst is when i try to open other apps; my phone freezes and itâ€™s like cheeto puffs are raining down from the top of my screen to the bottom. i repeat DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP UNLESS YOURE OKAY WITH ANNOYING CHEETOS MESSING UP YOUR PHONE.
